history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the BLUE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
USER I'm going to Forbes and Craig.
TTS Okay, going to forbes-craig apartments. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
TTS Okay, leaving from murray avenue at forbes avenue far side. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>

TTS There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 10 minutes, and you will take 1 bus..
Walk for about 2 mins to Forbes avenue at Murray avenue far side..
Take the 61A ,to Forbes avenue at Craig St. It will depart at 6:16pm..
Walk for about 1 min to 4531 Forbes avenue, Pittsburgh, PA 15213, USA..
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
